alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 3:13AM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Polk, Hardee, Highlands, Coastal Pasco, Coastal Hillsborough, Inland Hillsborough and Inland Manatee Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: A freeze warning means widespread freezing temperatures are expected to occur. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Exposed outdoor water pipes may burst if not wrapped or covered.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk
